column13: The Consolidated Entity continues incorporating provisions in service agreements, supply agreements, and trading terms with suppliers to address modern slavery risks. column8: Compliance by franchisees with franchise agreements
column13: This risk relates to franchisees acting in breach of the terms and conditions of their respective franchise agreements. The consequences of non-compliance may include damage to the brand, fines and other sanctions from regulators, and a reduction in franchise fees received from franchisees. The franchisor continually monitors and evaluates each franchisee's financial and operating performance to assess compliance with executed franchise agreements.\t
column21: Franchisee Compliance, Terms and Conditions, Franchise Agreements
